name: Oik 5
description: Casual physics puzzle. The player's goal is keep the blue block on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
